Divine Protection.quote: The Lord is my shepherd, I shall not want. (Psalm 23:1)

Divine Assistance.quote: Allah is the best of helpers. (Quran 3:150)

Divine Grace.quote: By grace alone. Thy grace is enough for me. (Guru Granth Sahib)

Divine Intervention.quote: When dharma declines, I manifest myself. (Bhagavad Gita 4:7)

Divine Support.quote: Cast your burden on the Lord, and he will sustain you. (Psalm 55:22)

Divine Guidance.quote: Guide us to the straight path. (Quran 1:6)

Divine Help.quote: Our help is in the name of the Lord, who made heaven and earth. (Psalm 124:8)

Divine Blessing.quote: May the Lord bless you and keep you. (Numbers 6:24)

Divine Strength.quote: I can do all things through Him who strengthens me. (Philippians 4:13)

Divine Deliverance.quote: Call upon Me in the day of trouble; I will deliver you. (Psalm 50:15)

Divine Comfort.quote: Blessed are those who mourn, for they shall be comforted. (Matthew 5:4)

Divine Rescue.quote: He is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble. (Psalm 46:1)

Divine Shield.quote: You, O Lord, are a shield around me. (Psalm 3:3)

Divine Care.quote: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you. (1 Peter 5:7)

Divine Victory.quote: Victory comes only from Allah, the Mighty, the Wise. (Quran 3:126)

Divine Healing.quote: I am the Lord who heals you. (Exodus 15:26)

Divine Light.quote: The Lord is my light and my salvation. (Psalm 27:1)

Divine Presence.quote: I will never leave you nor forsake you. (Hebrews 13:5)

Divine Solutions.quote: With every difficulty there is relief. (Quran 94:5-6)

Divine Answer.quote: Before they call I will answer. (Isaiah 65:24)

Divine Security.quote: The eternal God is your refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms. (Deuteronomy 33:27)

Divine Defense.quote: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still. (Exodus 14:14)

Divine Help.quote: Our help comes from the Lord, the Maker of heaven and earth. (Psalm 121:2)

Divine Support.quote: Fear not, for I am with you. (Isaiah 41:10)

Divine Sustenance.quote: The Lord sustains all who fall. (Psalm 145:14)

Divine Protection.quote: He who dwells in the shelter of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty. (Psalm 91:1)
